org.intellimate.izou.sdk.frameworks.presence.provider.template

Class PresenceConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.util.AddOnModule
      • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.events.EventsController
        • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.frameworks.presence.provider.template.PresenceConstant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListenerModel, EventsControllerModel, Identifiable, ResourceBuilderModel, ResourcesProviderBase, PresenceHelper, PresenceProvider, PresenceResourceProvider, ContextProvider, FireEvent, Loggable, LoggedExceptionCallback, ResourceUser, ExceptionCallback

    public abstract class PresenceConstant
extends EventsController
implements PresenceHelper, PresenceResourceProvider
    the base template class for addons able to conclude about constant presence.

    If the addon is based on encounters with the user and not able to conclude constant presence from the information, it should pass not extend this class, if not (for example if it monitors wifi) it can. They can just fire the Presence-Event on encountering. It is expected that addons extending this class are pretty sure that the user is around and not a random person.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    LeanderK
